channel.title: Shops help please
channel.description: Ok i need to add a food shop to my server... i added the new wanneshop stuff in client, id 41, made the keeper id 534, the fairy shop keeper, added shop 41 with all the stuff in it, spawned the npc 534 and compiled with no errors, ran and if u try to trade with it, u lagg out.

item.title: Shops help please
item.dc:creator: @superbum1 superbum1
item.description:
@superbum1 wrote:

maybe there is already a shop using the fairy…maybe use a dif npc?

Read full topic
